languages.text: "Я ошибался, предполагая, что под именем Авель Ханейманн скрывается благословенный архимагос Амарнат. Однако, он явно как-то связан с почтенным Авелем, и я намерен выяснить суть этой связи".

traits.locale_text: "Я ошибался, предполагая, что под именем Авель Ханейманн скрывается благословенный архимагос Амарнат. Однако, он явно как-то связан с почтенным Авелем, и я намерен инициировать расследование, которое выяснит суть этой связи и поможет отыскать моего почтенного наставника".
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "I was wrong when I assumed it was the blessed Archmagos Amarnat who assumed the guise of Abel Haneumann. But there is a connection between him and the reverend Abel, and I intend to uncover the nature of this link."
languages.original_text: "Я ошибался, предполагая, что под именем Авель Ханейманн скрывается благословенный архимагос Амарнат. Однако, он явно как-то связан с почтенным Авелем, и я намерен выяснить суть этой связи".

traits.locale_text: "I was wrong when I assumed it was the blessed archmagos Amarnat who assumed the guise of Abel Haneumann. But there is a connection between him and the reverend Abel, and I intend to commence an investigation to uncover the nature of this link and help me find my esteemed mentor."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I was wrong when I assumed it was the blessed archmagos Amarnat who assumed the guise of Abel Haneumann. But there is a connection between him and the reverend Abel, and I intend to commence an investigation to uncover the nature of this link and help me find my esteemed mentor."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I was wrong when I assumed it was the blessed Archmagos Amarnat who assumed the guise of Abel Haneumann. But there is a connection between him and the Reverend Abel, and I intend to commence an investigation to uncover the nature of this link and help me find my esteemed mentor."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I was wrong when I assumed it was the blessed Archmagos Amarnat who assumed the guise of Abel Haneumann. But there is a connection between him and the Reverend Abel, and I intend to commence an investigation to uncover the nature of this link and help me find my esteemed mentor."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I was wrong when I assumed it was the blessed Archmagos Amarnat who assumed the guise of Abel Haneumann. But there is a connection between him and the reverend Abel, and I intend to uncover the nature of this link."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Erré al asumir que fue el bendito archimagos Amarnat quien había asumido la identidad de Abel Haneumann. Pero existe una conexión entre él y el reverendo Abel, y tengo intención de descubrir la naturaleza de ese vínculo».
languages.original_text: "I was wrong when I assumed it was the blessed Archmagos Amarnat who assumed the guise of Abel Haneumann. But there is a connection between him and the reverend Abel, and I intend to uncover the nature of this link."

traits.locale_text: «Erré al asumir que fue el bendito archimagos Amarnat quien había asumido la identidad de Abel Haneumann. Pero existe una conexión entre él y el reverendo Abel, y tengo intención de descubrir la naturaleza de ese vínculo».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「アベル・ヘニュマンを装ったのは祝福されし大賢人アマルナトだったと思ったのですが、誤りでした。ですが、彼とアベル司祭の間にはなんらかの関係性があります。自分はその本質を明らかにするつもりです」
languages.original_text: "I was wrong when I assumed it was the blessed Archmagos Amarnat who assumed the guise of Abel Haneumann. But there is a connection between him and the reverend Abel, and I intend to uncover the nature of this link."

traits.locale_text: 「アベル・ヘニュマンを装ったのは祝福されし大賢人アマルナトだったと思ったのですが、誤りでした。ですが、彼とアベル司祭の間にはなんらかの関係性があります。自分はその本質を明らかにするつもりです」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “我错误地以为是大贤者阿玛纳特伪装成了亚伯·哈努曼，但他和亚伯牧师之间确实存在某种联系，我打算揭露这种联系的本质。”
languages.original_text: "I was wrong when I assumed it was the blessed Archmagos Amarnat who assumed the guise of Abel Haneumann. But there is a connection between him and the reverend Abel, and I intend to uncover the nature of this link."

traits.locale_text: “我错误地以为是大贤者阿玛纳特伪装成了亚伯·哈努曼，但他和亚伯牧师之间确实存在某种联系，我打算揭露这种联系的本质。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Je me trompais en pensant que le bienheureux archimagos Amarnat avait pris l'apparence d'Abel Haneumann. Cependant, il existe un lien entre lui et le révérend Abel, et je compte bien en découvrir la nature. »
languages.original_text: "I was wrong when I assumed it was the blessed Archmagos Amarnat who assumed the guise of Abel Haneumann. But there is a connection between him and the reverend Abel, and I intend to uncover the nature of this link."

traits.locale_text: « Je me trompais en pensant que le bienheureux archimagos Amarnat avait pris l'apparence d'Abel Haneumann. Cependant, il existe un lien entre lui et le révérend Abel, et je compte bien en découvrir la nature. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Meine Annahme, dass es der gesegnete Erzmagos Amarnat war, der sich als Abel Haneumann verkleidet hatte, war falsch. Doch es besteht eine Verbindung zwischen ihm und Reverend Abel, und ich gedenke, das Wesen dieser Verbindung zu ergründen."
languages.original_text: "I was wrong when I assumed it was the blessed Archmagos Amarnat who assumed the guise of Abel Haneumann. But there is a connection between him and the reverend Abel, and I intend to uncover the nature of this link."

traits.locale_text: "Meine Annahme, dass es der gesegnete Erzmagos Amarnat war, der sich als Abel Haneumann verkleidet hatte, war falsch. Doch es besteht eine Verbindung zwischen ihm und Reverend Abel, und ich gedenke, das Wesen dieser Verbindung zu ergründen."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: "I was wrong when I assumed it was the blessed Archmagos Amarnat who assumed the guise of Abel Haneumann. But there is a connection between him and the Reverend Abel, and I intend to uncover the nature of this link."

languages.text: "Abel Haneumann'ın kılığına giren kişinin kutsanmış Başmagos Amarnat olduğunu varsaymam hatalıydı. O ve muhterem Abel arasında bir bağlantı var. Ben de bu bağın doğasını ortaya çıkarma niyetindeyim."
languages.original_text: "I was wrong when I assumed it was the blessed Archmagos Amarnat who assumed the guise of Abel Haneumann. But there is a connection between him and the reverend Abel, and I intend to uncover the nature of this link."

traits.locale_text: "Abel Haneumann'ın kılığına giren kişinin kutsanmış Başmagos Amarnat olduğunu varsaymam hatalıydı. Onun ve muhterem Abel'in arasında bir bağlantı var ama. Ben de bu bağın doğasını ortaya çıkarma niyetindeyim."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
